title: Reflective Learning Design Workshop for University Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Course Management Experience
context.additional_context: Customized instructional design competency enhancement program for graduate students

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze their own instructional design processes through reflective journaling
Learners can improve lecture design in VR simulation environments using iterative prototyping techniques
Learners can diagnose issues in instructional design and derive solutions by combining peer feedback and self-reflection

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
